project.title: Process Team & Governance
project.description: Discover why the Process team also plays a vital role in the A2R Process-based Organization and how it impacts the delivery of the business results. Learn how this team collaborates with SME, OKC and other teams inside the organization using the intra-team communication and governance.
project.keywords: Process Team, Process Lead, Process team Lead A2R, Process-based organization, Subject Matter expert, OKC, Operational Key Contact, Interaction Model, A2R, Intra team communication
